name: Vegan Eggnog
description: Vegan Eggnog is rich, creamy and so easy to make in 5 minutes! No eggs or dairy required. Serve it spiked if desired for a fun holiday drink!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews (see notes for alternatives)
1/4-1/2 cup granulated sugar or pure maple syrup
1 ounce whiskey or rum, per serving, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 3 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring 3 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a blender along with the non-dairy milk, sugar (you can start with the 1/4 cup), vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon and cloves and blend until very smooth. Taste, add more sweetener or spices if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a blender along with the non-dairy milk, sugar (you can start with the 1/4 cup), vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon and cloves and blend until very smooth. Taste, add more sweetener or spices if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it chill in the refrigerator for at least an hour before serving, it will thicken up and give the flavors time to mingle. Serve alcohol free or add 1 ounce of whiskey/rum to each glass, as desired. I also topped mine with a little coconut whipped cream and a sprinkle of nutmeg.
